articles.description: It's a question facing millions as less effective doses—like Johnson & Johnson's and Sinovac's—hit the market.

articles.author: Peter Hanks
articles.title: Dow Jones, Nasdaq 100, S&P 500 Forecasts for the Week Ahead - DailyFX
articles.description: The Dow Jones and Nasdaq 100 look to be on diverging technical paths as volatility spikes. Meanwhile, the S&P 500 teeters on support as it splits the difference between its sister indices.
articles.content:
